title: Massimo Poesio | Semantic Scholar
markdown:
# Massimo Poesio | Semantic Scholar

A richer form of citation graph with nodes for both academic papers and their findings: the finding-citation graph (FCG); a new pipeline to construct such a graph is presented, which includes a finding identification module and a citation sentence extraction module.

A Fine-grained citation graph for biomedical academic papers: the finding-citation graph

    Yuan LiangMassimo PoesioRoonak Rezvani
    Computer Science, Biology
    Workshop on Biomedical Natural Language…
  • 2024
A richer form of citation graph with nodes for both academic papers and their findings: the finding-citation graph (FCG); a new pipeline to construct such a graph is presented, which includes a finding identification module and a citation sentence extraction module.
